item.title: Creating Law and Order Episode Generator
item.description: Learn how to use PromptSpark to build a GPT that generates Law & Order episodes from Reddit thread analysis

item.title: I Know AP: The Transformative Power of MCP
item.description: Explore how the Model Context Protocol (MCP) enables AI to adapt dynamically, transforming repetitive tasks and business intelligence processes.

item.title: Open AI Sora First Impressions
item.description: Explore OpenAI Sora, an AI-driven video generation platform, and its impact on creative industries

item.title: An Introduction to Neural Networks
item.description: A beginner-friendly introduction to neural networks, explaining key concepts and their role in artificial intelligence.

item.title: Automating My GitHub Profile with the Latest Blog Posts Using GitHub Actions
item.description: Learn how to automate your GitHub profile updates with the latest blog posts using GitHub Actions and Node.js to create an RSS feed.

item.title: EDS Super Bowl Commercials
item.description: Explore the history and impact of EDS’s groundbreaking Super Bowl ads from 2000-2001, showcasing IT project management challenges.

item.title: Using NotebookLM, Clipchamp, and ChatGPT for Podcasts
item.description: Learn how to use NotebookLM, Microsoft Clipchamp, and ChatGPT to create engaging podcast episodes for the Deep Dive playlist.

item.title: Workflow-Driven Chat Applications Powered by Adaptive Cards
item.description: Learn how to design workflow-driven chat applications powered by Adaptive Cards, enhancing AI interactivity and structured conversations.

item.title: Interactive Chat in PromptSpark With SignalR and Semantic Kernel Chat Completions
item.description: Guide to implementing a real-time, AI-driven chat application in PromptSpark using ASP.NET SignalR and OpenAI GPT via Semantic Kernel.

item.title: Building Real-Time Chat with React, SignalR, and Markdown Streaming
item.description: Explore building a real-time React chat app with TypeScript, SignalR for live messaging, and streaming Markdown rendering.
